text: Paulo de Siqueira Garcia (13 May 1959 - 30 July 2017) was a Brazilian physician and politician. He was a member of the Workers' Party. He was the mayor of Goiânia from 1 April 2010, when then-mayor Iris Rezende resigned in order to run for Governor at the 2010 election until 2016. He was born in Goiânia, Goiás. On 30 July 2017, Garcia died of a heart attack at his home in Goiânia, aged 58. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Workers' Party (Brazil) politicians Category:Brazilian mayors Category:People from Goiânia Category:Politicians from Goiás Category:Brazilian physicians
title: Paulo Garcia
